EmailTemplate.name: ($?) Collection Follow-up
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I’m writing because we haven’t heard back from you after my previous email.
Please email me back as soon as you can, so I can charge the amount and close the case on your account. I can charge your card on file or, if you’d prefer, you can call me with a different method of payment. Please note that if we don’t hear back from you within 5 days, your account information may be sent to collections.
For more information about damage and GearGuard, please refer to that section on our help page (borrowlenses.com/content/damage_waiver), or review the Equipment Lease Agreement (borrowlenses.com/content/rental_agreement).
I look forward to hearing from you soon.
Kindly,
{!Case.OwnerFirstName} BorrowLenses.com Repair Team Repair@BorrowLenses.com
